date.description: The date for which the report data is recorded.

af_prt.description: The AppsFlyer Partner which the data belongs to.

media_source.description: The source or platform where the ads are displayed, such as Facebook or Google Ads.

impressions.description: The total number of times the ad is displayed.

clicks.description: The total number of clicks on the ad.

click_through_rate.description: The ratio of ad clicks to impressions, indicative of ad performance.

installs.description: The total number of successful app installs from the ad campaign.

conversion_rate.description: The percentage of ad clicks that lead to a desired action, such as an install or purchase.

sessions.description: The total number of sessions or interactions with the app.

loyal_users.description: The number of users who repeatedly engage with the app.

loyal_users_rate.description: The percentage of users who are considered loyal out of total installs.

total_cost.description: The total cost of running the ad campaign.

average_ecpi.description: The average earnings per install for the campaign.
